00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"

00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples

00034   */
00035

00044 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 #define DELAY_TIME          (32000)
00046 #define DELAY_TIME_LSI      (100)
00047 
00048 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 void SysClockConfig_LSI(void);
00050 
00051 static void __Delay(vu32 count);
00052 
00053 void Clock_TestFun(void);
00054 
00055 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00056 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00057   * @brief  Main program.
00058   * @retval None
00059   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00060 int main(void)
00061 {
00062   /* Initialize LEDs                                                                                        */
00063   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00064   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00065 
00066   Clock_TestFun();
00067 
00068   while (1)
00069   {
00070   }
00071 }
00072 
00073 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00074   * @brief  Clock sourse switch test
00075   * @retval None
00076   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00077 void Clock_TestFun(void){
00078   int i;
00079   for (i = 0; i < 300; i++)
00080   {
00081     /* Toggle LED1                                                                                        */
00082     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED1);
00083     __Delay(DELAY_TIME);
00084   }
00085   HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED1);
00086 
00087   SysClockConfig_LSI();
00088 
00089   for (i = 0; i < 100; i++)
00090   {
00091     /* Toggle LED2                                                                                        */
00092     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED2);
00093     __Delay(DELAY_TIME_LSI);
00094   }
00095   HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED2);
00096 
00097 }
00098 
00099 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00100   * @brief Configure system clock as LSI.
00101   * @retval None
00102   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00103 void SysClockConfig_LSI(void)
00104 {
00105   while (CKCU_GetClockReadyStatus(CKCU_FLAG_LSIRDY) != SET);      /* wait LSI ready                         */
00106   CKCU_SysClockConfig(CKCU_SW_LSI);                               /* select CK_SYS source                   */
00107   CKCU_SetHCLKPrescaler(CKCU_SYSCLK_DIV1);                        /* set CK_AHB prescaler                   */
00108 
00109   #if (LIBCFG_FMC_PREFETCH)
00110   FLASH_SetWaitState(FLASH_WAITSTATE_0);
00111   #endif
00112 
00113   CKCU_HSICmd(DISABLE);                                           /* Disable HSI                            */
00114 }
00115 
00116 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00117 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00118   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00119   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00120   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00121   * @retval None
00122   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00123 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00124 {
00125   /*
00126      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00127      Debug message can be added here.
00128      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00129   */
00130 
00131   while (1)
00132   {
00133   }
00134 }
00135 #endif
00136 
00137 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00138 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00139   * @brief  delay function
00140   * @param  count: delay count for loop
00141   * @retval None
00142   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00143 static void __Delay(vu32 count)
00144 {
00145   while (count--);
00146 }
